description: The native medium of software designs is code.

activities.name: CodeRyte: A Case Study in Software Design and Development
activities.description: Eric Benoit, a Designer at Involution Studios, will walk through a year long project.

activities.name: 4 Techniques that are easy to design and hard to build
activities.description:
There are certain things that look easy on paper but can be black holes in development and usability. We will talk about
  • semi-persistance
  • Apple like search results
  • data rich dashboards
  • decision algorithms

activities.name: Redesign This Course
activities.description: As a group, redesign what this course should look like in the future. What should be taken out entirely? What deserves more time?
